title: Way to go your S10 changes take everything we hate and make it even worse.
body:
Because bot laners are not already free food for the solo laners who are usually 2 levels ahead now they get to be 3 levels ahead?

Cool nice alcove you added for "outplays" so the already heavily favored mobility champs who give up nothing for the mobility get even more ways to abuse their mobility.

MORE DAMAGE MORE DAMAGE MORE DAMAGE. Yes that is what we want.

Meanwhile balanced match making nothing. strategic gameplay nothing. Just making it easier for someone to mash 3 buttons and delete people.  Yikes.

replies.body: Altho this a extremely bad patch the fact they removed {{item:3161}} makes he unable to criticize riot properly.
They threw it back in with cloud drake
Uh, not a good idea. Hopefully they make 4 cloud spawn less likely if they plan on going that route.

You don't need 4 Clouds. You get Dragon Soul from the fourth dragon regardless of combo you have. You may get Cloud Soul while having Fire Moutain Cloud. The third dragon decides what Soul will be possible, whoever gets four dragons first gets it. You only need RNG to decide it's gonna be 3rd Cloud game, not 4 Cloud game.

> [{quoted}](name=TheSingularity,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iK9j2oBA,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-10-17T01:23:45.022+0000)
>
> They threw it back in with cloud drake

Do you even know the scaling
It doesn't have scaling. It's Dragon Soul not Elemental Buff.

> [{quoted}](name=Velzard of Koz,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iK9j2oBA,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2019-10-17T10:16:21.096+0000)
>
> It doesn't have scaling. It's Dragon Soul not Elemental Buff.

And does it grant 50 % attack speed with 20% CDR reduction with each auto on ult cast?

If not it’s not spear of sojin.

It doesn't give AS but it doesn't require you to use your ult to work. It also lowers your cooldowns with ability hits in addition to basic attacks. So depending on the numbers, it can potentially be way better than shojin.

Yes, but if it's 2% cooldown reduction then it's a pathetic, useless ability that really won't make a difference. If it's 100% cooldown reduction then it's a billion times worse than Shojin. Since we don't know the numbers, its really impossible for us to say if its actually a problem or not.

> [{quoted}](name=TheSingularity,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iK9j2oBA,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-10-17T01:23:45.022+0000)
>
> They threw it back in with cloud drake

Everyone is saying this but Spear of Shojin only lowers non-ultimate cooldowns and the new cloud drake is only going to lower ultimate cooldowns. Am I missing something here?

EDIT: Nvm, I see you're talking about Cloud Dragon SOUL not the normal buff.
not really unable per say, but it's something positive about the patch
Sadly they put it on cloud drake which is a team wide buff.

I don't get how you say bot lane is free food when they are doing the eating. ADC out damage top/life steal/critical damage/attack speed/mobility where as top has to burst the bot lane down (ADC) to ensure they win.

I never understand why Bot laners are the one complaining when they are the one doing the most damage.The damage you complain about also transfer to ADC not just top.

its because Bot lane is almost always a fiesta. Mid and Jungler are always bot lane 24/7 and it just turns into 8 people bot lane gang bang while Top lane is of course off in their own little world doing nothing. With how far behind Bot lane is going to be, now Top lane will be joining in because you can't risk your team losing the fight since Mid will be 3-4 levels higher than your Bot lane. An early double kill for either team is going to snowball that lane and possibly the rest of the game.  Its just going to be 10 people in a lane off TP cooldown to prevent your bot lane from being double killed.

> [{quoted}](name=Stephenizgod,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iK9j2oBA,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-10-17T04:46:54.433+0000)
>
> its because Bot lane is almost always a fiesta. Mid and Jungler are always bot lane 24/7 and it just turns into 8 people bot lane gang bang while Top lane is of course off in their own little world doing nothing. With how far behind Bot lane is going to be, now Top lane will be joining in because you can't risk your team losing the fight since Mid will be 3-4 levels higher than your Bot lane. An early double kill for either team is going to snowball that lane and possibly the rest of the game.  Its just going to be 10 people in a lane off TP cooldown to prevent your bot lane from being double killed.

You want to know why everyone ganking is for bot lane? Because BOT LANE is practically 65% of the deciding factor of winning the game because of ADC bull crap damage that's why mid and jungler come's bot. ADC has outrages bull damage and what the hell you are 3-4 level behind a mid/top lane? That has never happen unless you actually not farm and let them take your cs.

I mean the real reason is not lane lane is the deciding factor, dragons, more money hence the two people. People basically want to free up the bot lane so they can rotate to top lane soon as possible and grab herald around 12 ish mark. Basically they are trying to funnel as much as possible into the adc, because well they are pretty fucking worthless till 2 items. Once they hit 2 items, they get rolling. Also bot lane is not the deciding factor of the game. Objectives are the deciding factor, and jungler.

I never said they were weak, I was explaining why Bot lane will be food for Top/Mid next season. And ADC's are out of fashion brother, Mages  and Assassins are king right now. Even in Bot lane. Also you don't gank bottom to shut down the ADC, you do it because you are a higher level and they are 2 potential kills. 2 kills can snowball a game, has nothing to do with shutting down the ADC.  

The 3-4 levels behind is referring to the preseason changes, Top and Mid will get boosted XP and Bot lane will get reduced XP or something like that. You are already 2-3 levels behind the solo laners, this is going to push it to around 3 levels higher. If you are behind you can easily be behind 4 levels with these new changes.  

Weaker Bot lane = easier kills. So if one team goes down to start that snowball, the other team is going to join to save them. It will be even more of a fiesta than it already is.

> [{quoted}](name=LegendmakerGTX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iK9j2oBA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-10-17T03:24:34.162+0000)
>
> I never understand why Bot laners are the one complaining when they are the one doing the most damage.

Because they want to be Batman AND Robin. Maybe they already do the most damage, but do they also do the 2nd most damage? No? Then it's time to give them more damage!

> [{quoted}](name=LegendmakerGTX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iK9j2oBA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-10-17T03:24:34.162+0000)
>
> I don't get how you say bot lane is free food when they are doing the eating. ADC out damage top/life steal/critical damage/attack speed/mobility where as top has to burst the bot lane down (ADC) to ensure they win.
> 
> I never understand why Bot laners are the one complaining when they are the one doing the most damage.The damage you complain about also transfer to ADC not just top.

Bot lane is free food because they are always under leveled. It’s a very different idea than bot lane becomes
Impactful. If you are being honest literally at no point in the game is your adc off hunting down the Enemy mid lamer or top It’s always the other way around both the top lane and mid are constantly trying to catch out a solo adc because they know they will win that 1v1 everytime. How is that not free food lol.

In the end ya adc does a lot of dmg uhm they buy full dmg items and have range range will always be super powerful but doesn’t change the fact that top lane vayne or Quinn will always destroy what ever not lane adc is in the game or zed or yasuo etc...

Stop confusing range damage dealer in team fight with lane assignments.

> [{quoted}](name=LegendmakerGTX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iK9j2oBA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-10-17T03:24:34.162+0000)
>
> I don't get how you say bot lane is free food when they are doing the eating. ADC out damage top/life steal/critical damage/attack speed/mobility where as top has to burst the bot lane down (ADC) to ensure they win.
> 
> I never understand why Bot laners are the one complaining when they are the one doing the most damage.The damage you complain about also transfer to ADC not just top.

Only if you're trying to 1v2 them... which is entirely fair.
40% of the team should have 40% of the power. If you're 20% of your team trying to take on 40% of theirs, you should expect to lose unless you are **fed**.

> [{quoted}](name=LegendmakerGTX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iK9j2oBA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-10-17T03:24:34.162+0000)
>
> I don't get how you say bot lane is free food when they are doing the eating. ADC out damage top/life steal/critical damage/attack speed/mobility where as top has to burst the bot lane down (ADC) to ensure they win.
> 
> I never understand why Bot laners are the one complaining when they are the one doing the most damage.The damage you complain about also transfer to ADC not just top.

Cause more damage isnt a blessing when you want less damage :P
Anyone else initially read this as "$10 changes" and wonder what the heck the OP was talking about?

> [{quoted}](name=SpecterVonBaren,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iK9j2oBA,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2019-10-17T10:19:33.420+0000)
>
> Anyone else initially read this as "$10 changes" and wonder what the heck the OP was talking about

I kept reading comments just to figure out what the hell he was talking about because I read it that way as well. Thanks for pointing out that my brain doesn't work.

riot: we heard you

me: okay... then why are you doing the exact opposite?

it begs for an answer: is riot doing this on purpose? saying they heard us and then do the exact opposite? why?

> [{quoted}](name=Jennifer420,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iK9j2oBA,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-10-17T09:44:09.522+0000)
>
> it begs for an answer: is riot doing this on purpose? saying they heard us and then do the exact opposite? why?

My guess would be the PR guys at Riot think words are cheap.

> [{quoted}](name=Jennifer420,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iK9j2oBA,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-10-17T09:44:09.522+0000)
>
> riot: we heard you
> 
> me: okay... then why are you doing the exact opposite?
> 
> it begs for an answer: is riot doing this on purpose? saying they heard us and then do the exact opposite? why?

No they're just incompetent

Conqueror being nerfed.
**Mountain drake gives resistences buffs instead of offensive objective destroying buffs (the most important part of the game).**
Klepto nerfed.
Aftershcok changed.
Spear of Shojin nerfed.
Lethality item changes (more items, but each gives less lethality).
Toplane scales better with XP, making it so a TP or a roam wont put you behind your jungler or bottom lane in terms of level.
Herald spawns earlier and twice, further giving toplaners and objectives to contest with their jungler.

Elder, while yes, granting execute at 20% health, is also not doubling your previous drake stats, and the burn damage is lowered, tho i'll be honest - this is the most troubling change i've seen so far, and i'd rather it be changed - HOWEVER when you take it out of the vaccum, and realise that having an elder means one team has 4 drakes stacked AND took an elder, it's kinda put it in a different context, just like Baron buff, elder is a means to an end it's supposed to be a tool to break sieges and teamfights and an objective your team SHOULD be defending, just like your inhibitors and just like Baron.

There is a lot of good changes on paper here.

i think it's worth clarifying that they plan on removing spear of shojin, not just nerfing it, last i checked. A similar mechanic is still there in the way they're changing cloud dragon, but i'm hoping that it's drastically nerfed, seeing as dragons affect your entire team.

> [{quoted}](name=JackMcCarry,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iK9j2oBA,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-10-17T10:05:57.678+0000)
>
> Toplane scales better with XP, making it so a TP or a roam wont put you behind your jungler or bottom lane in terms of level.

Yeah now you'll be 4 levels ahead instead of 3. 

Is this real life? do solo laners actually not realize how broken OP they already are compared to bot/jg

I play both adc and top, while toplaners around here are usually whining waaaay too much about anything that happens toplane, they are right on this, toplane has less influence, giving more XP allows them more windows to roam and TP outside of lane without falling behind in levels to jungle and botlane.

You don't see all the effects of the changes, tho.

 - More EXP on mid?
Yes, that means the solo-laners are overall stronger. But that also means the exact same roaming you complain about is MUCH more risky since you loose a ton of EXP on top of the already existing plates!

- Reduced Bot EXP?
Yes, that means the lane is more vulnerable. But guess what. It also means the lane (2 out of 5 players) deal noticeable LESS DMG! THAT'S WHAT WE WANT! Additionally Mage Supports need EXP to be usefull, so they will be alot less impactfull which once again results in LESS DMG due to Tank/Heal supports becaome more viable! 

------------
The alcove is beyond my grasp. I don't see what ever interesting gameplay they expect to result from them...
Is there supposed to be something usefull? Or just a new path you can hide in? I don't get it, at all.
Not sure why you're downvoted but you're 100% correct. This also puts power into top lane mains and stops them from feeling like they can't do anything since they'll be higher level.

He got downvoted because most people posting on boards care about their own hide over the balance and health of the game. Bot mains complaining that their lane will be bad when their lane is the deciding factor of most games should give you a hint about how shortsighted people are. Coming from a bot main btw

Well if you ask me, bot lane items need to cost more. Reducing their xp doesn't reduce their gold income since they should be farming to mid game anyway. Bot lane is already the slowest to level up though. This makes adcs a lot easier to kill as a jungler since the jungle xp is relatively matched to mids if they jungle effeciently. A difference in XP makes assassin mid laners and junglers more overbearing than they already are to bot lane. The major gripe I currently have is with mages and mage itemization. Mages deal too much damage and their items are too efficient with little to no counterbuild. Which is why a mage from mid can be played as support and still do as much damage as they would if they were mid.

OK guys chill out on flaming this patch, what you dont realize is that these changes are so huge they could completely change the meta as we know it. Just like how the double laner top switched to top jungle, the lanes might switch completely. One idea of what could happen is an adc mid with a mage bot and a bruiser top. Then the support would instead migrate to one of the jungle sides. We could see a double jungler meta happen which would increase the amount of invading that happens throughout the game.

Personally, the double top lane was a lot funner and more balanced than 1 v 1 lane with jungle, which dictates the overall flow of the game. Also, you remember the assassin meta and tank meta? Changing the meta doesn't mean things will get better. While I appreciate your thoughts on diversity, I don't think actual implementation of diversity is being brought in the new patch. As OP stated, it's just taking the problems we already have and amplifying them.

Meta changes arent always the best, but what it does is allow for new mind sets coming into the next season. Its exciting to see what pro and top players will decide to do with these changes and see if the impact of it will even come as far to affect lower elos.

actually, with the changes to make solo xp higher and shared xp lower, might there be a world in which it makes more sense to have the duo lane be top and the solo lane be bot, if the xp increase is sufficient enough to make the new 'bot' laner a stronger help on earlier dragons and rotations? it kinda feels to me as though many adcs, if given the opportunity, would like to sit on an island by themselves for a while and scale. of course, if both adc and support migrate top side, that might just change jungle pressure to be more top-oriented, but with the added importance of dragons in the preseason info we have so far, might that be enough to counteract it to some degree?

Well look at it like this. Pro players will do whatever they can to get more xp on their carries, more pressure around the map, and more more dragons (cause of the buffs) with double jungler they have the option to instead of soaking all the xp off one laner they can level 3 and gank double gank or just get one gank on 2 different lanes. With double jungler they will also have more dragon control cause of two smites, and because of the dragon changes its gonna be that much more important to get more control of them. Im not a very experianced player, only plat, but theres alot of options for pro players to go with, and im excited to see what they do with it for better or worse
There's absolutely no reason to be nerfing bot lane XP.
and jungle gets screwed over more. wooo exciting

That's exactly as for _Season 8 ---> Season 9_. Garbage into more garbage.

It couldn't be otherwise: that's what you get when the same incompetent people are allowed to keep failing in what they do, instead of being **replaced**.

> Because bot laners are not already free food for the solo laners who are usually 2 levels ahead now they get to be 3 levels ahead?

This is just simply not true, bot laners are actually VERY strong and impactful right now.

> Cool nice alcove you added for "outplays" so the already heavily favored mobility champs who give up nothing for the mobility get even more ways to abuse their mobility.

It's actually worse for champs with a lot of mobility due to FOW.

Maybe nerf {{champion:223}}  ??? 
I mean... please?
wait, why are we nerfing tahm kench?

I think you don't get it :) the XP will not only ensure that ADC and support are level 7 by the time jungler hits 8 and Mid and Top lane is level 11, so the second level of R, But also that many people that  main support and ADCs will start playing MID and TOP again: D hence queue Time will go up and ect ect ect ... back to season 3 :) - we are going
And by the way, that's like when TOP or MID are even 
But if they die a few times, the game is over for the BOT as well because there enemy Top or Mid Laner, it is not LVL 11 but LVL 13: ^ p That's 5 levels above BOT.
But everything will show in time, Its not preseason yet and everything can change ... and who knows it might be even better
Anyhows my 2 cents :) love u all :p WP Rito i love your GAME  Waves :)-
Why are they adding more damage, isn't there to much already? As a support do I have to change rolls?

I really enjoy playing in the bot lane. I do not feel like I am free food. I believe bot lane is a lot of fun and I play it very well as a support. I'm also honor level 5 so people often compliment me.  Obviously if all the negative things in this forum were true, then I would hate the game and quit.  I just think a lot of players are toxic and salty.
Just saying you are likely honor level 5 because you play support.

You are aware Infernal Drake and Cloud drake do exactly the opposite from Earth and Ocean drake and benefit immobile champions the most by opening up the map and offering speed boosts respectively, right?
